name: Alceris Analytics
author: Alceris

sections.description:
Alceris is a free privacy focused website analytics solution which creates insights, without using any user specific data or cookies. A powerful GDPR compatible Google Analytics alternative.

‚úÖ Get more information and a live demo

Why use Alceris

üîë Privacy first

We don’t collect any user identifying data. All data is aggregated upon arrival in our infrastructure in europe.

üá™üá∫ European analytics

All collected data is stored and served only via European servers.

‚ú® A great alternative to Google Analytics

Google is shutting down Universal Analytics in 2023. Now it is a great time to perform the switch to a privacy friendly and powerful analytics solution.

üç™ No need for cookie banners or consent dialog

Are you hating all these cookie and consent banners all over the web too? Great news! With Alceris you don’t need to implement these for our analytics solution.

‚ö°Ô∏è Highspeed script

Our analytics script is very small and don’t slow down you website.

Setup this WordPress plugin
sections.installation:
1. Log into WordPress
  2. Go to Plugins, Add New
  3. Search for Alceris Analytics
  4. Click Install Now, then Activate
  5. Go to Settings, then Alceris Analytics
  6. Enter your Site ID. It can be found in the “Website integration” tab on the Alceris dashboard

short_description: Powerful privacy friendly, GDPR compliant Google Analytics alternative.
